description: A wordplay joke on job loss at a keyboard factory.
title: Shiftless Job
n_1: Tom looks puzzled at his workstation surrounded by keyboards.
n_2: Tom, bewildered, glances at the 'Shift' keys.
c2_2: Not enough for the shift key!
n_3: Boss shows a pile of keyboards, all missing the 'Shift' key.
c2_3: Yes, it’s key to our business!
n_4: Tom exits, while Boss holds a keyboard, smiling at the pun.
